Name: COUNTDOWN
About the game: Play with up to 12 players online and work together to prepare to escape the space station before it is destroyed. But watch out! Androids have 'woken up' and are attempting to destroy the station and all witnesses! I am the sole developer of COUNTDOWN. New feature development has been put on hold as I focus on the release of my next title. Any game-breaking bugs will be addressed as soon as possible. Please report any via email or our discord server. In-game proximity chat! Crewmates: Complete tasks to delay the self-destruct sequence and prepare your ship for evacuation Androids will attempt to thwart your efforts by hacking your visor, ejecting you from the airlock, causing reactor meltdowns Use security terminals to keep an eye on suspicious activities Call emergency meetings or report dead bodies to vote to eject the rogue AI Androids: EXTERMINATE all humans. Trick the humans into ejecting each other. Hack the systems on board to prey on the humans Features: Customize victory conditions and various cooldowns In game chat Pick your color
